attributes.action: Make legal aid available for both parties in child custody cases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, if spouse A qualifies for legal aid, and spouse B does not, spouse A need simply play a waiting game until B runs out of funds (which they will, unless they are earning more than a lawyer).

Money should be no object when deciding what is best for children, so to allow legal aid for both parties would ensure both parents can make as good a case as possible, so the most informed decision can be made on what is best for the children.
